snippet: John Orozco, 19, has one more chance for a medal after he struggled on the pommel horse, then fell on his vault during the men’s team finals. “Oh, I’ll bounce back,” he said.
abstract: Olympic gymnast John Orozco, who struggled when the United States finished fifth in the men's team finals, will try once more for a medal in the individual all-around.
lead_paragraph: John Orozco, 19, has one more chance for a medal after he struggled on the pommel horse, then fell on his vault during the men’s team finals. “Oh, I’ll bounce back,” he said.

headline.seo: Bronx Gymnast Puts Rough Day Behind Him
headline.main: Getting Back Up Is Nothing New for Bronx Gymnast
headline.print_headline: Getting Back Up Is Nothing New For Bronx Gymnast
